message.body: So in the weird twists of life, I think I'm gonna be hanging with karas kids tomorrow late afternoon/early eve.Maybe a kid date? I don't know how to responsibly
manage three youngins for an extended period by myself. My house is not kid safe
Oh my, what are you going to do? Is Kara moving in? I will be at school tomorrow, take them to the park!
Hung out with EK for a minute, feel even cheaper as an induvidual. Try and keep that a secret.
Yikes...what went on? Why so low?
Get rid of it
Mohawk!
Not again, but maybe something weird in transition. Myhair is three knots.
I'm in lanc, I will be home Monday..make a hair cut date?
Yeah, Monday, whenever. I just don't think Tuesday works for me. Asap though before I do something dumb
I will be back in the evening, I will let you know when I am back
How was your night?? Ms king told me you slept over ? You old dog you!
I had an awesome night with her. You can pass that along if need be
Haha, that's awesome, I'm glad to hear it. Love is in the air...
Speaking of things that end in air, I don't think she wants me to cut my mess. Weirdly, I don't hate it as much since I started washing it again
Call me if yr awake, I think I probably####### up
Ms king hasn't mentioned to me about the middle of the night exit, so I'm not going to say anything about knowing unless she does
Okay, but I don't care either way, she and I are cool. Please say yes to breakfast??
I have school, but she thinks you are great. Let's double date
Let me single date first, but yeah
She's friends with my bf and I'm friends with you, it's double date heaven
Maybe we can all bring our husbands too
Haha, sorry, rough
Zing!
It's ok, I'm used to it. I'm going to take Nate to Wes' moms for Xmas eve, ha
I just recommended to kings that we get drinks tomorrow, you down?
Pizza and beerz at dock street?
Yeah, I suppose, but way to lett me get my single date in there first
It will be better this way!
Not what I meant! But it will be comfortable and give you a strong foundation for your one on one date!
I think it's important for you guys to become friends before anything else happens
I think we're taking care of that
Ok, just let things develop organically. I'm so glad you are going to meet my bf
I'm going to grill him and make him cry
He better be louder than pat mannix
His current goals include making my life easier
What time?
Tonight? My hope was around seven
Have you talked to kings?
Or earlier. She always has to be up super early. Yeah, but not about tonight
Me too, She confirmed for that time
Cool, then that works.
Awesome, group hangout with my favorite people!
How was the rest of your night?
Alright I suppose. How bout you?
Ugh, not good. I was mad at bf
Why?
Dunno
Well give him a break, he probably only means well
Yeah
I am in a terrible mood and have been since I got to my house last night
Me too! Since I left pizza. I don't know what to do
What to do in what sense? Me either,and it sucks. Last night I vocalized my affinity for emotionally unavailable women & it made me realize I'll never be happy
I had the same conclusion about myself. Maybe vocalizing such things will give you freedom from them? Sometimes epiphanies are like that
I hope so,but that essentially means'run away from erin'and in no way do I want to do that.At the same time,with her on the burner I'm not going to get
close to anyone else, either. Its a trap I keep setting up for myself.
Right...you need to think about what u really are looking for and proceed in that direction. you need to stop loving ladies that are already in relationships
Yeah, but that aside, I really like erin.
Well shes great. I know she wants something really stress free right now tho. It might not be what you are looking for but then maybe it is
I dunno. I just need to figure this out before I die by my own hand bitter and perpetually alone. If I make it to 40 in this state I'll bow out respectfully.
That gives you a solid decade to get sorted. Just let things flow with Erin, without making her a fixation. You need something going on other than her
I know, I'm hoping the bank babe is working today, I honestly think I broke her heart by not asking her out yesterday. Now I'm probably too late.
It's never too late!
King Of Bad Timing.
Wasn't at the bank yesterday or this morning. I officially have no reason to go to the bank again today, king of bad timing
You will have so many reasons for financial transactions in the future, don't despair
Got bank ladys number, but she has a boyfriend. On the plus side, it isn't a husband.
You are moving up! Why did she give you her number if she has a bf?
Because I'm a dog and this is in fact Philadelphia.
She sounds like quite a lady
Aw c'mon.
It just sounds like a mess, that's all
You saying that if I asked you for your number you wouldn't give it to me?
I've bee dating Nate for less than two months and I wouldn't give another dude my number. When you know what u want, u get it
That's the game I've always played and I hate it, but I guess that'll never break
I'm still incredibly frustrated with women. You and boyfriend work things out?
Boyfriend and I are perfect. What about the ladies is frustrating u?
Pretty much everything
I'm tired of chasing women who don't havee time for me. If I'm gonna do that I might as well just chase kara
Stop dating women in relationships the
Then
Kevins band is playing at the beaumont warehouse @ like 10 tonight, you should go. Probably their last show
Whoa, maybe, it depends on rain
Its not raining
Are you going to thanksgiving?
I completely forgot about it. I'm doing homework, I should keep doing it, I was curious tho
Sooo I hung out with heather the other night, but the bigger part of the story is clint told heather flatware died like a year ago.
What!!! Why? Did he think that made him seem cool? So what was hanging out w heather like? Is she still with trolley?
I have no idea why. Hanging out with heather was weird because I don't hate her and she looked really hot.Not with that scumbag but probably with some scumbag.
Yeah probably. She was always pretty hot. But I feel like she got kinda busted for a while..but I don't really remember. Clint's weird.
She did, and I expected busted but was greatly disappointed. She just moved back into lemon street.
Whoa. Who was living there? Did you hang in lanc?
I dunno, someone random. She moved outta some other dudes place and stayed in a hotel until that apt.opened up. No one would let her move in cuz of raja
I was there to get my car inspected, gotta go back again this weekend to inspect my car part 2
Oh jeez. I miss that dog. Was raj living in a hotel? Lanc is weird.
Lancaster is definetly weird
I feel like its stuck on a loop. And anyone I knew that lives there just talks about breast feeding and cloth diapers all the time
Hahaha. Its like olympia lite
I had an amazing dream last night that I found a bill and Ted t shirt at a thrift store and gave it to you for Xmas.
Most excellent
It truly was. It was from the '88 Wylde Stallions world tour
Are you moving to Washington?
Colorado is more likely
All those places with mountains..this is why pyramids were built
Pyramids were built because desert people missed mountains. Pyramids are the previous lifes bain capital
All of my classes are about pyramids. I'm pretty much majoring in ancient aliens right now. 2012 is the best
Hey we are going to rays for drinks tonight after dinner if you feel like coming out, probably around ten, birthday 2012
I'll be there
Most excellent
I just want you to know that when I'm late its because of erin king
I know you would never be late of your own accord
How am I the only one here?
Thanks for coming out Saturday, I had fun!
Good, glad to be there, hope you also had a great time yesterday on your actual birthday
I did, even tho we just stayed in bed all day, it was awesome.
Nicki minaj is so inspiring to work out to
Will you be in lanc Xmas night?
I'm gonna be headed back to philly that night. I'll be up there starting late tomorrow night
I'm taking Nate, so we aren't leaving until Monday. Want to give him the total experience
I've got a crock full of pork and kraut that you should come devour if you want to have a good year
Oh yum..I am waiting for my mom to drop off Ella. Can we get breakfast soon?
Yeah, probably. I'm at work early everyday
How early is early?
I'm generally there by 9, just let me know when. Next week is kinda easier than this week
Whenever..I'm on break until the 22
Breakfast on wed, thur, or fri...ladies choice
Lets do Thursday! Early?
Yeah, early. They open @8
Ella's bus gets her @ 8:15 I can leave after that!
Awesome
Yum waffles
Still on for breakfast tomorrow?
Yes!
Cool, get ahold of me when you're leaving
Ok
Leaving
See ya soon
I'm listening to Mel's hole, it's so good
Nice
"It's really going to tick me off if the Israelis have our hole"
This just keeps getting better
What time do u get done w work Tuesday? Lets hang
Probably like 730 or 8, and yeah lets hang
Are you coming to my place or am I comimg to your place?
I can come to your place, let me know when u r home
I'll be home by 745, 8 at the latest. You should consider bringing chinese food from luckys because I don't feel like making food.
Or a fig pizza
Sorry, I'm just hungry, but if you bring food I'll pay for it. And if you bring a pizza I'll buy better beer.
Sorry I've been at the most epic green house. Yes, I will bring pizza
We still haven't left shwenksville, I'm at the mercy of other people. Can we do this Thursday?
Yeah, sure but I think it has to be at my house because I'm fairly sure tennis is important on Thursday
Thanks, this day just keeps going on and on
No sweat. Same here if it makes you feel any better
I want to take you to this green house, it's amazing. Day trip
We stilll on for tonight or are you lost in a forest?
I am in Philly proper. What time are you thinking? Would you still like pizza?
I'll be home by 8 and yes pizza. I've got budweiser and good bourbon
What house number
Can you make a hat for me?
What kind of hat?
Beanie. Any that I buy are too tight for my fat head
Sure! I have a fat head too
Awesome, I'll pay ya for it. I'm just sick of not being able to find a good hat
Color preferences?
I dunno, light gray or dark red or whatever, nothing bright
No rainbow confetti
No, solid
Of course
Measure your head for me when you get a chance
Will do
I think my head is 23" around. Is that possible?
Can you do breakfast tomorrow?
Not tomorrow, but ever day next week. On spring break!
Me too, I'm leaving for st.pete tomorrow night!
Oh yeah MTV spring break for Ben! When do you get back?
Not til the following Sunday or Monday maybe. David allan coe in daytona, its all gonna be nuts
Holy cats, you might just stay
Any interest in seeing spring breakers some eve this week?
Yes of course
What night can you do?
Ugh I can't really do any night until next Tuesday. I have a test I need to study for tomorrow night and riding Thursday.
Damn, well I saw it Friday, probably will again tomorrow or weds. and then againn with you on Tuesday.
Salvador Plascencia is speaking at my school next week
WHHAAT? Can I come?
Yes! It's open to the public. Wednesday at 7:30
That's the best thing I've ever heard
I'm quite excited. He's writing a new book, about the ocean
Fudge
Can we ride to the thing at your school together, or will youu already be there? We still on for movies on Tuesday?
I will already be at school on Wednesday, do you know how to get there?
No, give me an address or something
Call me when u are near and I will come meet u
I watched youtube videos about the shining a lot last summer, you should watch the guy that wasn't in room 237, mstrmnd. His videos are good and even more crazy involved.
I will look into it, I've got 237 on my tv for one more night (tonight) if you wanna see it again
I watched it online. That guy goes into the moon thing a lot more and the impossibility of spaces. Also the gold room as a metaphor for the national reserve
I'm looking at his writing now, I'll never get any work done with this shit.
I've got. 237 on my cable box through tonight, come watch if you're free
I know, I lost like two weeks to this guy in the summer
I'm in with kiddo tonight
I believe it being his genocide/nazi movie the most
I don't know what to think. I think he definitely used subliminal messages and subliminal spatial impossibility.
Spring Breakers on Tuesday, for real
Are you coming out tonight still?
Yup. What's weird is I typed up a message for you a few hours ago about tonight but it didn't send. Yes, though
Ok, I will be in the library, let me know where u r
When u gonna b here?
30 or less,driving
Yay
Here
Almost thar
Ok, I will be there! Can't wait
(This will make more sense to you tomorrow, but) Spring Break Forever
SBF
I'm here
Come in
Did you get a note on your car last night? You were in "the spot" I'm reading a crazy article:the rapist next door:on h.k's spring breakers
Nope no note. I will check that out. I need to see it again before I start my analytic essay
Its on a website called the millions, must be a ladies sight. I just did a google search for korine, its pretty out there
That movie is a feminist polemic
Have you listened to any of Fredericks Mind Thing?
No, what is it? I wish I was seeing evil dead right now
Fredericks from new port richies podcast. Its like negativland
Wait. New port? New bridge?
Best show
New bridge!
I'm downloading it now.
Evil dead
No, New Port Richie. Real place, real dude, 100%
Why did you say best show?
Because he's a caller. Fredericks from florida, c'mon
Oh ok, I know fredericks, sorry
You had me worried and I was getting angry at my phone
I thought you thought new bridge was new port
I'm not an idiot
What if the sandy hook and movie theater shooting were really humanities attempt to reach the fourth dimension?
Meaning, I don't think they really happened, each in different capacities. But I do believe we've been tricked into believing in both
How would we reach fourth dimension by believing in something that isn't real? Need to know
Everything exists there. Every possibility can be a reality
The closest we're ever getting to 'reality' as 3 dimensional beings, is at least a second behind. Think of a world with no barriers of time
So how can we shift?
That's what we're on the cusp of
But why? What actualizes it?
As an individual, I don't know. But I'm sure big bodies like the govt or Illuminati have a decent understanding of it
And now the Boston marathon
Yeah, probably because I ran my mouth about that other shit. Its frustrating how many stories are already blurry with this, too
Watching the poolice chief say "we're not looking for any specific box truck" in response to being asked about a yellow pensske truck....
Way to go Ben. It's because the danger is everywhere, anywhere
...meanwhile, listening to police/fire scanners in boston and all emergency responders are chasing a very specific box truck
Always
So something about the collective belief of an imaginary thing?
To a point, yes. Complex smoke and mirrors.
The obama that is speaking right now is a double, or else he's an alien with low energy right now
Yeah, his speech was just going through the motions
http://www.cnn.com/2013/04/20/us/boston-attack/
Oh my god, its too much. They probably cut out his tongue
Illuminati sacrifice
Id say they're overly pleased with yesterday
Ashley Benson= my new Scar Jo
Is scar Jo out?
I'm looking at pictures but I can't tell which one she is in a group. Rachel korine is oddly unattractive
She hasn't impressed me lately. Britt. The whitest one. And that movie doesn't produce flattering stills of rachel
Neither do red carpet shots. But she was so beautiful in mr lonely
Is she the taller of the two blondes?
She's the shorter haired probably taller blonde
Yeah she is a fox. Shes only 5'4. Did you know harmony korine is only 5'8? James Franco is 5'10. Hollywood is a buncha shorties
I know that, ain't my first day
It's all I got from asking mr internet for her number. I will keep on it. Next week is my last week of school, lets get bref the week after
And benzo is like benjo.
We're soulmates
Find her
She's a twin
That seems right
I think she's the evil one, which is odd because generally in twin scenarios I'm drawn towards the innocent one
I don't think she's a twin. Her wiki page says she has an older sister, and when I typed in twin, it talked about other people she looks like
I'l look into this, her older sister is a fitness jesus freak
How good are you at cornrows? I wasn't prepared for so much upkeep
I wouldn't say I'm good at all. Do you have corn rows?
I do
And I love it, but its fairly nappy by day 3
Hmmm. I have no idea. Should you be sleeping in a shower cap? How long are they supposed to last?
Only like a week at best, I ain't doing a shower cap. I just want fresh rows
No doubt. Lets breakfast soon
Yes, any day this week works I think
